summary: Many people across the country use ridesharing and taxi services. Advocacy groups and others have raised questions about the safety of these services, as both drivers and passengers have experienced violence. This report describes: States and localities' background check requirements for ridesharing and taxi drivers Safety features ridesharing and taxi companies offer before or during a trip We surveyed passengers about such safety features. title: Ridesharing and Taxi Safety: Information on Background Checks and Safety Features
